title: What are the basic chapters of class 11 that you are required to do before starting the JEE class 12 chapters? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are many chapter of class 11th which are basic for class 12 th or JEE , These chapters are following:- 1.Thermodynamics 2.Equlibirium 3.Organic chemistry 3.periodic table 4.chemical bonding 5 Atomic structure & 6. Basic chemistry These all are important chapters of class 11th which are basic for class 12 th …if you don’t know about these chapters you will face many trouble …so please first you read these chapters then you touch the book of class 12th. THAT’S ALL
